nodes.text: Gonky was a defective GNK-series power droid who served Clone Force 99 aboard the Havoc Marauder. Wrecker frequently used the droid as a weightlifting aid. The enhanced clone Omega used the droid as a cot for a brief time. Additionally, she spoke to Gonky on occasion, showing it her trooper doll. When the Havoc Marauder was boarded by enemy Zygerrians, Omega told the droid to hide, to which he simply powered down.
Gonky first appeared in the Star Wars: The Clone Wars episode "A Distant Echo," albeit unnamed. He was later identified on the StarWars.com Databank.
